sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card elevation="0" color="blue lighten-5">
    <v-container>
      <v-row class="custom" align="center" justify="center" >
        <v-card-title>
          Inside
        </v-card-title>
      </v-row>
      <v-row>
        <v-divider class="pb-3 mt-n3 mx-5"></v-divider>
      </v-row>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-row class="px-3">
            <InfoBlock tag="Temperature" :value="temperature" suffix="Â°C"></InfoBlock>
          </v-row>
          <v-row class="px-3">
            <InfoBlock tag="Humidity" :value="humidity" suffix="%"></InfoBlock>
          </v-row>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-card>
</template>



<script>

import InfoBlock from '../home/InfoBlock'


export default {
    components: {
        "InfoBlock": InfoBlock
    },
    data() {
        return {
          temperature: 21,
          humidity: 21
        }
    },
    methods: {
      temp() {
        var today = new Date();
        this.temperature = today.getSeconds();
      },
      humd() {
        var today = new Date();
        this.humidity = today.getSeconds() + 5;
      }
    },
    mounted() {
    setInterval(() => {
        this.temp()}, 1000)
    setInterval(() => {
        this.humd()}, 1000)
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
